text:
@realDonaldTrump Evidence pls?
Its like me without proof saying, some1 tactically used Covid-19 to restructure trades, force back work from foreign countries, fast track state reopening to help boom % work force #, mass distributs homemade PPE/Equipment be4 a 2nd way & Nov votes. Anything else?
